name: Jerome SILO, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Phillip Johnson, Joan Delie, Lee J. Mazur, Thomas J. Dempsey, Jr., and Dale Adair, Appellees

parties: Jerome SILO, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Phillip Johnson, Joan Delie, Lee J. Mazur, Thomas J. Dempsey, Jr., and Dale Adair, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 22nd day of June, 2001, the above captioned appeal is quashed. The Motion For Appointment of Counsel is dismissed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
777 A.2d 412
Jerome SILO, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Phillip Johnson, Joan Delie, Lee J. Mazur, Thomas J. Dempsey, Jr., and Dale Adair, Appellees.
No. 62 M.D. Appeal Docket 2001.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 22, 2001.
